All the while, her steps cause the cloth over her waist to sway back and forth. As David tries his best to turn the plane, the cloth sways left. Only a small patch of sunlight sheds on the darkened jungle cliff that was to the tiny two, her groin.

David panics. The nose of the plain aims smack dab towards that hair-tangled cliff. He makes a last-minute adjustment so it doesn't crash. But as a consequence, he flies far too low against it. Now the jungle of hairs has its way. The tangled masses bash into the wings, slowing down its doomed flight. Despite David's frustrated piloting, gravity takes over and the plane falls. Fortunately, or unfortunately, the plane gets tangled in the pubic forest as it falls. Suspended by a net of hairs, it is the only thing separating the aircraft from being a metal-and-blood mess on the sand far below it. To the far right through the forest, the native's fleshy canyon stands like a geographic feature rather than an anatomical one.

David lets go of the controls. The plane is safe enough for the time being, but it won't last. He yells towards his wife. "Dear, we gotta go!" Amber didn't get a good view of the groin forest, so she remains oblivious to what unfolded. All she knew was that David made a crash landing - both are thankful to be alive. Teenager
Adult
1342.content: How old is this female?
1342.title: Giant Female?

choices: No, she takes the plane and leaves
Yes, what a cute dolly!
13421.content:
"David, what is this place?" Asked a scared Amber. " don't worry honey. We just need to get some fuel and we'll be gone." The two start to walk around looking for someone to help them, with David and amber holding each other as they walk. However, as they as talking, a "little" girl saw the plane go down. She approached the plane and picked it up. "Cool!" Said the girl. Amber and David turned around to see the giant girl holding their plane! Amber almost passed out due to the sight of a giant girl, but David kept her conscieois. David told Amber to stay there and he ran towards the girl, waving his arms and telling he to stop.
Does she hear/see him?
13421.title: Little girl

choices: He makes it to his wife
The girl catches him
134212.content:
The little girl looks down and sees David. "What a cute dolly!" The little girl starts te bend down to pick him and so David makes a run for it, heading to his wife
What happens?
134212.title: Yes, what a cute dolly!

choices: “This is your honeymoon, take off all of your clothes, and make love.”
Some of her friends come over?
1342121.content:
The giant little girl reaches down just as the tiny man reaches the tiny woman, and gently grabs them both. The giant girl lifts the terrified couple up to her face and opens her hand. Standing in the middle of the palm of her huge hand, the young giantess notices the tiny couple is dressed similar to a bride and groom. “Did you dollies get married?” the little giantess asks them with a thunderous voice.


David and Amber look back at the giantess and nod their tiny heads yes. A second later, David looks up at the giantess and in a squeaky mouse like voice asks, “What is your name? How old are you, and can we talk to your parents or an adult?”


The little girl replies, “My name is Tina and I’m 10. As for talking to an adult, not yet, I want to play with and study you two first. Maybe I will take you both to my science class tomorrow? By the way, what are your names my little dollies?”


Amber replies this time, and tells Tina everything. After Amber tells her everything, she asks Tina to reconsider and tell an adult about them. Tina just grins at the couple and ignores their squeaky pleas as she quickly walks away from their miniature airplane. Several miles away, at least from the tiny couple’s point of view, Tina finally comes home. Tina gently cups her hand gently trapping the miniature couple inside. Tine enters her bedroom without incident and places the tiny unharmed couple inside of a nice dollhouse. There is miniature furniture everywhere, but everything is still too big for them. The shocked couple notices they are in a bedroom, standing next to a large yet soft bed that has no sheets on it. They also see no clothes or sheets for them to wear. “What are we going to do?” Amber asks as she holds David.


“We are going to do what she says and survive until we can find help,” David responds while trying to comfort her. Just then, the tiny couple hears Tina giggling. The curious young giantess is holding a magnifying glass and says to the tiny couple…
1342121.title: The tiny couple and the young Giantess.

choices: “Hey sis, come see this plane!”
“Hey guys, this is awesome!”
13422.content:
Without warning, a giant pair of hands grab onto the plane, lifting it from the ground with ease. Two tiny humans stared upwards as a titanic being gawped at it in wonder.

“Oh wow,” her voice was loud. “What a tiny little plane!”

This person must have been at least thirty feel tall. But there was no time to ponder how the couple only came up to her shin, somehow remaining unnoticed, because she’d already taken off at lightning speed, shouting,
13422.title: Teenager

choices: In the palm of a giant hand?
In a pond or river?
Readers choice?
134222.content:
The miniature couple holds on, and watches from the cockpit as the giant teenage girl runs over to some other giant teenage girls yelling loudly at them. David and Amber duck down while the small group of giant teenage girls looks inside their airplane. The couple quickly unstrapped themselves, and attempts to hide behind their seats while a beautiful young green skinned giantess, a young Asian looking giantess, a young Hispanic looking giantess, a young White giantess, and two young Ebony giantesses look inside the planes windows, admiring how detailed the inside of the aircraft is. The small couple is naturally scared, and in a state of shock as the six 30 to 40 foot teens bicker, and shake the plane a bit. This action forces a door to pop open, and some of their luggage falls out onto the ground below.


David is desperately holding onto Amber, as they are both at in risk of falling out of their plane. While Amber hangs on to one of David’s arms, her dress is caught on the door. David’s pants, shirt, and coat are caught on a seat. When the plane is shaken a bit more, they both fall out of the plane. David’s coat, shirt, and pants are quickly torn off the tiny man’s body. Amber’s dress also tears from her tiny body. David is now wearing only his socks and underwear as he helplessly falls with Amber. Amber is only clad in her pantyhose, and underwear as she to falls to the ground with David. The miniature couple continues to scream as they fall to the ground below. However, they are saved when they both gently land where together?
134222.title: “Hey guys, found a model plane."

choices: A white couple in their 30's shrinks together?
A white couple in their 20's shrinks together?
More choices please?
135.content: How about these choices? A newlywed couple shrinks together, and they are?
135.title: You choose how they shrink together?

info.brief_description: A honeymoon turns into a struggle for survival.
info.description:
What is supposed to be a perfect honeymoon turns into a nightmare as the bride and/or the groom shrinks.

RULES

1) Nobody else shrinks.
2) Nobody grows.

Apart from that, anything goes.
